analysis.Summary: Vue component that renders a UI block for depositing funds via credit card, including an amount input, currency label, estimated receipt display, and navigation buttons.
analysis.Purpose: Serves as one step in the wallet deposit flow, allowing users to enter an amount in USD and proceed with card payment or return to the previous menu.

Components.name: CardDeposit
Components.description: This component encapsulates the card deposit form and emits navigation events.

Components.name: Field
Components.description: Reusable input component imported from @martyrs to capture the deposit amount.

Functions.name: backSelection
Functions.description: Emits the 'back-selection' event to notify the parent to return to the selection menu.

Functions.name: switchMenu
Functions.description: Emits the 'switch-menu' event with a screen index to navigate within the wallet flow.

parameters.name: screen
parameters.description: Index of the target menu screen.

analysis.Usage: Imported into a parent wallet view or container to display the card deposit step. Listens for its emitted events ('back-selection', 'switch-menu') to manage navigation in the wallet module.
